description: This file defines the OrdersScreen widget for a Flutter app, rendering a list of order cards with images, status badges, and action buttons. It uses mock data and models for order information.

classes.name: OrdersScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that renders a list of order cards with a header showing the number of orders.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that displays details of a single order, including image, status badge, title, author, quantity, placement date, and action buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for OrdersScreen and _OrderCard, constructing the widget tree.

methods.name: _date
methods.description: Formats a DateTime object into a human-readable string (e.g., Jan 1, 2024).
